name: Boston stay with boutique B&B - Venice Room
neighborhood_overview: Natalie House is situated at the edge of the Boston College campus and less than 2.5 mi from Harvard University and Boston University. We host a lot of business travelers and parents coming to visit their students or attend Graduations and Open houses. St. Elizabeth’s Medical Center is less than 1 mi away and we have many visiting medical professionals, patients, and relatives coming to visit hospital patients staying at our house. Some of them do not even use cars or public transportation, they enjoy an easy walk to the hospital. And of cause, we have a lot of tourists coming from all over the world to visit Boston.
description:
Our house is located in one of the quiet old 2-3 story Boston neighborhoods. We have three guest rooms. Each room is uniquely decorated as a particular place. Venice and Cape Cod rooms located on the 2nd floor and have a shared bathroom. The 3rd-floor studio “Irish Pub” has its own private bathroom. Common areas include a breakfast room, living room, and balcony. Our guests enjoy watching squirrels, turkeys, and hummingbirds in the backyard from their windows and balcony.

description:
Stay in our comfortable, quiet, spacious studio with a private bathroom on the THIRD FLOOR of our home in one of the best locations in Brighton, on the edge of Boston College campus, Green Line T station, and bus stop. This room can sleep up to 4 guests. It is equipped with a mini-fridge, coffee maker, TV, WiFi, electronic lock. The shared space includes a living room, breakfast room, another bathroom, balcony. We clean thoroughly with disinfectants.
